page.title: 06Clubs and Groups
page.content: The only organised leisure activities in Costock are the{Youth Club,Play {Group}and{Over Sixties Club.} The{Youth Club}takes place in the Village Hall and is on Friday night at 7.30 until 9.30.It is for eleven year olds and over.Children from Costock,Rempstone and East Leake come to this. The{Over Sixties Club}is every Tuesday at 2.30 until 4.00. There is also a{Play Group}in the Village Hall for three to five year olds,and is held on Tuesdays,Thursdays and Fridays from 9 am. to midday. In Rempstone there was an{Old Folks {Club}but that no longer exists.
